de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.dataaccess.write

Interface IWrite<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the untÂ´derlaing mapper class
    All Superinterfaces:
    IDataAccessObject<T>

    public interface IWrite<T>
extends IDataAccessObject<T>
    IWrite is responsible for all write actions into the connected datasource. It performs inserts and updates.
